description: Details required by condition 8 (Construction Management Plan) and condition 25 (Arboricultural Impact Assessment) of Planning Permission 18/16440/FUL for the Demolition of the existing buildings and the construction of a mixed-use development comprising a food/convenience retail store (392 sqm) at ground floor level (Use Class A1) and four residential units comprising 2 x 2 bed and 2 x 3 bed self contained units above (Use Class C3) with associated parking, loading bay, landscaping and access.
decision_conditions: The details submitted for Condition 8 (Construction Management Plan) and Condition 25 (Arboricultural Impact Assessment) of Planning Permission 18/16440/FUL by the applicant are considered satisfactory and these conditions are hereby fully discharged.
The details submitted for Conditions 9 (Details of fences) and 10 (CO2 Emissions and water usage) by the applicant are considered satisfactory and these conditions are hereby fully discharged.

The fee required for your pre planning application is Â£ 1250.00.  Payment can be made via either our Contact Centre on 0208 547 5002, by cheque made payable to Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames or online via the Kingston council website.
